Title: Title
Rank (#1 is goal you'd refuse last): Rank (#1 is goal you'd refuse last)
Pelorus is: Pelorus is a simple yet highly-effective strategic planning tool that helps reaching goals in a way of successive approximations
Stage is a goals period: Stage is a timeframe for your goals. Stages are hierarchical and can be created for week, month, year and several years (e.g. decade). Start here to create your first stage
Create goals: Once you have a stage, you can start creating goals for it. Goals are also hierarchical so that one 5-years goal can have sub-goals for each year, month and week. You can copy parent goals when creating substages
Switch views: You can switch between different types of stages by simply clicking it's folded caption
Edit goal: If you feel you should change your goal, you can edit it's description any time or remove it (unless it has sub-goals)
